subtitleNullable: This dataset contains pictures of human faces having happy, sad & angry emotions
descriptionNullable: This dataset contains three folders namely Happy, Sad and Angry. Each folder contains around 100 images of each mentioned expression. You can use this dataset for various purpose including classification using Convolutional Neural Networks and Computer Vision.
title: Human Face Emotions
subtitle: This dataset contains pictures of human faces having happy, sad & angry emotions
description: This dataset contains three folders namely Happy, Sad and Angry. Each folder contains around 100 images of each mentioned expression. You can use this dataset for various purpose including classification using Convolutional Neural Networks and Computer Vision.
